response.overview: The sexy redhead Nurses’ Aide (Stella Luxx), who works at the local sperm donor clinic, is uncontrollably drawn to assist the handsome donor, Tyler Drake. Each time Stella tries to help collect Tyler’s semen, she becomes fixated, loses concentration and finds a way to contaminate the sample. Of course this means Tyler will need to make multiple appointments – something Tyler is more than happy to do. Tyler and Stella learn a valuable lesson… “If at first you don’t succeed, try, try again!”
response.title: The Girl In Scrubs
